Author: glugglugbiggulp
Text: Soooo here’s my edgy opinion but equating CICO to disordered eating is just projecting because the people saying that are afraid to face their own situation: that if you want to lose weight, you gotta be conscious and accountable for what you put in your mouth. *That’s* why they also think losing weight is done at the gym also - so they think it’s something hard and unattainable, while in the end, the concept is so fucking simple.  So, so, so many non-dieting people view losing weight as just going to the gym. After losing some weight a friend asked me if I ”live at the gym” - no sis, I go maybe twice a week, I just no longer binge 6000 calories a day!!!!  Here’s another edgy opinion as a side note, these are the same people who think when you hit the gym you’ll immediately start looking like big Arnold with huge bulking muscles.
